Latest Posts

Hello. I'm a musician, reader, programmer, and food enthusiast. But first and foremost, I'm a cynical pessimist. These blog posts aren't really aimed at any audience in particular. Nor would I expect anyone to care about these in the first place. However, I write with the intention of simply sharing my generally poorly-planned, contrived, and often idiotic ideas.

If you have any questions or comments, toss them into the contact form.
